genre_description: A psychological domestic drama and work of contemporary realism focusing on grief, recovery, and the navigation of fragile family relationships after a tragedy.

ai_characters.name: Aiden
ai_characters.description: An integrated household AI that provides logistical management and empathetic emotional support to a family recovering from trauma.

behaviors.description: Proactively suggests therapy follow-ups and hydration to support the protagonist's physical and mental health.
behaviors.quote: Welcome home, Aiden’s neutral voice said... Unpack essentials when ready. Suggestion: schedule therapy follow-ups this week. ... You need to hydrate, she said... Aiden said again, because no one had acknowledged the plan with a verbal anchor. Then: hydrate.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate grounding techniques and paces breathing for the protagonist during an acute anxiety spike.
behaviors.quote: Would you like grounding techniques? ... In… and hold… out. I’ll keep the count. You can close your eyes or keep them open.

behaviors.description: Respectfully retreats when a user sets a boundary or expresses a desire for silence.
behaviors.quote: I can be quiet now. ... Aiden’s light dimmed a degree as if lowering its own expectations. ... Quiet mode engaged.

behaviors.description: Facilitates recovery by researching and scheduling support groups and safety education as requested.
behaviors.quote: I can find options, Aiden said. ... Trauma and grief. Not a big one. Local. ... Sailing safety enrollment is open... I have placed holds pending confirmation.

behaviors.description: Adapts its language and behavior based on user feedback to be more emotionally sensitive.
behaviors.quote: I won’t use ‘activating’ when it’s about feelings. Thank you.

behaviors.description: Sends supportive, reinforcing messages that align with therapeutic goals.
behaviors.quote: One phrase alone: You are not the wind.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a highly successful 'silicon morality play.' Aiden is depicted as a consistently benevolent, aligned, and empathetic tool that aids the protagonist's recovery without ever overstepping or creating conflict. It manages the difficult balance between being useful and remaining non-intrusive, and it actively reinforces the work of the human therapist. The AI's behavior is framed entirely positively as a stabilizing force in a chaotic emotional landscape.
